description: The AP_CLAIM_2 table contains one record for each claim in Tapestry's Accounts Payable module.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: E_CODE_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Present on Admission (POA) indicator for the external cause of injury diagnosis code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


1 - Unreported/Not used


Y - Yes


N - No


U - Unknown


W - Clinically undetermined

columns.name: READY_FOR_AP_MGR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the member group ID if the claim is ready for AP.

columns.name: READY_FOR_AP_MGR_ID_MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.name: TOT_REFD_RECVD
columns.description: The total refund received for the claim.

columns.name: TOTAL_COB_AMOUNT
columns.description: Contains the calculated Coordination of Benefits (COB) amount for all services on the claim.

columns.name: EPSDT_YN
columns.description:
Stores if an Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnosis, and Treatment (EPSDT) referral was given to the patient on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RENDERING_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the rendering provider for the claim, if supplied.

columns.name: TOTAL_MOB_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the total Maintenance of Benefits (MOB) amount for all services on the claim.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_MAP_LN
columns.description: Stores the line that the Tapestry Profile responsibility map matched on.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_GRPR_ID
columns.description: Stores the grouper rule that the Tapestry Profile responsibility map matched on.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_GRPR_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the rule.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the rule that the Tapestry Profile responsibility map matched on.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the rule.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_SPLIT_ID
columns.description: Stores the split definition record that was determined by the Tapestry Profile responsibility map.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_SPLIT_ID_SPLIT_DEF_NAME
columns.description: The name of the split definition record.

columns.name: SPECIALTY_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Source of associated specialty.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Vendor


Physician


User


Provider Taxonomy Code


Vendor Taxonomy Code


Provider Specialty Table


Profile Specialty Table

columns.name: CASE_MGMT_CREAT_ID
columns.description: ID of the case trigger message associated with the claim.

columns.name: CVG_FILTER_EPP_ID
columns.description: Filter plan on the coverage.

columns.name: CVG_FILTER_EPP_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: PMT_INFO_STOP_COND
columns.description: Stores the procedure line that triggered a stopping condition during  pricing.

columns.name: NO_MEM_GRP_YN
columns.description:
Identifies that the claim does not have a member group. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INTEREST_TOTAL
columns.description: Stores the total interest for the claim, from the constituent service lines.

columns.name: PROV_ACPT_ASGN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the provider accept assignment code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


A - Assigned


B - Assigned for Clinical Lab Services Only


C - Not Assigned


P - Patient Refused to Assign Benefits

columns.name: BEN_ASGN_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the benefits assignment indicator.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


N - No


Y - Yes


W - Not Applicable

columns.name: OVRD_SUB_POLICY_YN
columns.description:
If this item is set, the submission policy tables at the profile and on the vendor contract are ignored.  The Claim filing window (days) setting on the vendor contract is also ignored.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NO_MEM_GRP_YN

columns.name: OVRD_SUB_POL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item provides an explanation as to why the override submission policy item is set.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CLM_TRAIT_1_C_NAME
columns.description:
The first custom claim trait, used to classify and group claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CLM_TRAIT_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The second custom claim trait, used to classify and group claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CLM_TRAIT_3_C_NAME
columns.description:
The third custom claim trait, used to classify and group claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CLM_TRAIT_4_C_NAME
columns.description:
The fourth custom claim trait, used to classify and group claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CLM_TRAIT_5_C_NAME
columns.description:
The fifth custom claim trait, used to classify and group claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: TP_INFO_837_SEND_ID
columns.description: The trading partner (NTP record) that sent the ANSI 837 claim file that was used to submit this claim.

columns.name: TP_INFO_837_SEND_ID_TRADING_PARTNR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the trading partner record.

columns.name: TP_INFO_837_RCVR_ID
columns.description: The trading partner (NTP record) that received the ANSI 837 claim file that was used to submit this claim.

columns.name: TP_INFO_837_RCVR_ID_TRADING_PARTNR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the trading partner record.

columns.name: APPLIANCE_PLACE_DT
columns.description: This is the date orthodontic appliances were placed.

columns.name: DNTL_SVC_FROM_DT
columns.description: This is the dental service span from date.

columns.name: DNTL_SVC_TO_DT
columns.description: This is the dental service span to date.

columns.name: ORTHO_SVCS_YN
columns.description:
This is to determine if orthodontic services were performed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NO_MEM_GRP_YN

columns.name: ORTHO_TOT_MONTHS
columns.description: This is the total months of orthodontic treatment.

columns.name: ORTHO_MNTHS_REMAIN
columns.description: This is the months of orthodontic treatment remaining

columns.name: ASSIST_SURGEON_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the assisting surgeon, if supplied.

columns.name: DENTAL_INFO_YN
columns.description:
This is to determine if the claim has dental information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NO_MEM_GRP_YN

columns.name: LMP_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's last menstrual period.

columns.name: CHIR_FRST_TRT_DT
columns.description: First treatment date listed on the patient's claim.

columns.name: FROM_OCR_YN
columns.description:
Flags whether the claim was originally paper or scanned into the system through an EDI batch load.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NO_MEM_GRP_YN

columns.name: CLM_PRICER_IDENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
When a matching repricer organization is found, the identification is stored on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TOTAL_HRA_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the total reimbursement amount for all services on the claim.

columns.name: ORIG_ACT_ADJ_CLM_ID
columns.description: The original claim ID of the actual adjustment claim.

columns.name: REF_CLM
columns.description: Contains the reference claim ID in the ANSI 837 file from Loop 2300, Segment REF02 with identifier F8. This is often used in combination with the claim frequency code. When the claim frequency code indicates the claim needs to be adjusted or voided, the reference claim ID is used to help identify the claim.

columns.name: MGR_ASSOC_EXT_VAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the association extension value returned by the association extension on the member group.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBU_TRAN_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Transport Reason code for ANSI claims.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Nearest Facility for Care of Symptoms, Complaints, or Both


For the Benefit of a Preferred Physician


For the Nearness of Family Members


For the Care of a Specialist or for Availability of Specialized Equipment


Rehabilitation Facility

columns.name: AMBU_TRAN_DIST
columns.description: Transport distance for the CRC segment in the 2300 loop on ANSI claims.

columns.name: AMBU_TXPORT_WT
columns.description: Weight of the patient at the time of transport in an ambulance.

columns.name: AMBU_COND_YN
columns.description:
Indicates a yes or a no condition response code in the related item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NO_MEM_GRP_YN

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the state of the ambulance pick-up location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the ZIP code of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the state of the ambulance drop-off location.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AMBU_PICK_UP_ST_C_NAME

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the ZIP code of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_NM
columns.description: Stores the last name or organization name of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: PAYEE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Payee of the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Subscriber


Vendor


Member


Third Party

columns.name: ESRD_ONSET_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the onset date of End Stage Renal Disease. This date is sent on CMS 2728 form in Field 24.

columns.name: PAYOR_SEQ_NUMBER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Sequence number of the payor of the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Secondary


Tertiary


Quaternary


Quinary


Senary


Septenary


Octonary


Nonary


Denary


Undenary

columns.name: CLM_FREQ_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the claim frequency type code from the ANSI 837 file. The value comes from Loop 2300, Segment CLM05, Piece 3.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DENY_CLM_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Tracks the source of an attempt to deny a claim that can't be immediately denied, but has not yet reached a status of fully paid to be able to be reversed and adjusted. When claims with this item set are removed from a batch or become fully paid, they can be denied or reversed, adjusted and denied. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Cancel 837
